1 'use strict';
  2 
  3 var _ = require('underscore');
  4 
  5 module.exports = function(AV) {
  6   /**
  7    * A builder to generate sort string for app searching.For example:
  8    * <pre><code>
  9    *   var builder = new AV.SearchSortBuilder();
 10    *   builder.ascending('key1').descending('key2','max');
 11    *   var query = new AV.SearchQuery('Player');
 12    *   query.sortBy(builder);
 13    *   query.find().then ...
 14    * </code></pre>
 15    * @class
 16    * @since 0.5.1
 17    */
 18   AV.SearchSortBuilder = function() {
 19     this._sortFields = [];
 20   };
 21 
 22   AV.SearchSortBuilder.prototype = {
 23     _addField: function(key, order, mode, missing) {
 24       var field = {};
 25       field[key] = {
 26         order: order || 'asc',
 27         mode: mode ||'avg',
 28         missing: '_' + (missing || 'last')
 29       };
 30       this._sortFields.push(field);
 31       return this;
 32     },
 33 
 34 
 35     /**
 36      * Sorts the results in ascending order by the given key and options.
 37      *
 38      * @param {String} key The key to order by.
 39      * @param {String} mode The sort mode, default is 'avg', you can choose
 40      *                  'max' or 'min' too.
 41      * @param {String} missing The missing key behaviour, default is 'last',
 42      *                  you can choose 'first' too.
 43      * @return {AV.SearchSortBuilder} Returns the builder, so you can chain this call.
 44      */
 45     ascending: function(key, mode, missing) {
 46       return this._addField(key, 'asc', mode, missing);
 47     },
 48 
 49     /**
 50      * Sorts the results in descending order by the given key and options.
 51      *
 52      * @param {String} key The key to order by.
 53      * @param {String} mode The sort mode, default is 'avg', you can choose
 54      *                  'max' or 'min' too.
 55      * @param {String} missing The missing key behaviour, default is 'last',
 56      *                  you can choose 'first' too.
 57      * @return {AV.SearchSortBuilder} Returns the builder, so you can chain this call.
 58      */
 59     descending: function(key, mode, missing) {
 60       return this._addField(key, 'desc', mode, missing);
 61     },
 62 
 63     /**
 64      * Add a proximity based constraint for finding objects with key point
 65      * values near the point given.
 66      * @param {String} key The key that the AV.GeoPoint is stored in.
 67      * @param {AV.GeoPoint} point The reference AV.GeoPoint that is used.
 68      * @param {Object} options The other options such as mode,order, unit etc.
 69      * @return {AV.SearchSortBuilder} Returns the builder, so you can chain this call.
 70      */
 71     whereNear: function(key, point, options) {
 72       options = options || {};
 73       var field = {};
 74       var geo = {
 75         lat: point.latitude,
 76         lon: point.longitude
 77       };
 78       var m = {
 79         order: options.order || 'asc',
 80         mode: options.mode || 'avg',
 81         unit: options.unit || 'km'
 82       };
 83       m[key] = geo;
 84       field['_geo_distance'] = m;
 85 
 86       this._sortFields.push(field);
 87       return this;
 88     },
 89 
 90     /**
 91      * Build a sort string by configuration.
 92      * @return {String} the sort string.
 93      */
 94     build: function() {
 95       return JSON.stringify(AV._encode(this._sortFields));
 96     }
 97   };
 98 
 99   /**
100    * App searching query.Use just like AV.Query:
101    * <pre><code>
102    *   var query = new AV.SearchQuery('Player');
103    *   query.queryString('*');
104    *   query.find().then(function(results) {
105    *     console.log('Found %d objects', query.hits());
106    *     //Process results
107    *   });
108    *
109    * </code></pre>
110    * Visite <a href='https://leancloud.cn/docs/app_search_guide.html'>App Searching Guide</a>
111    * for more details.
112    * @class
113    * @since 0.5.1
114    *
115    */
116   AV.SearchQuery = AV.Query._extend(/** @lends AV.SearchQuery.prototype */{
117      _sid: null,
118      _hits:  0,
119      _queryString: null,
120      _highlights: null,
121      _sortBuilder: null,
122     _createRequest: function(params){
123       return AV._request("search/select", null, null, "GET",
124                                    params || this.toJSON());
125     },
126 
127     /**
128      * Sets the sid of app searching query.Default is null.
129      * @param {String} sid  Scroll id for searching.
130      * @return {AV.SearchQuery} Returns the query, so you can chain this call.
131      */
132     sid: function(sid) {
133       this._sid = sid;
134       return this;
135     },
136 
137     /**
138      * Sets the query string of app searching.
139      * @param {String} q  The query string.
140      * @return {AV.SearchQuery} Returns the query, so you can chain this call.
141      */
142     queryString: function(q) {
143       this._queryString = q;
144       return this;
145     },
146 
147 
148     /**
149      * Sets the highlight fields. Such as
150      * <pre><code>
151      *   query.highlights('title');
152      *   //or pass an array.
153      *   query.highlights(['title', 'content'])
154      * </code></pre>
155      * @param {Array} highlights a list of fields.
156      * @return {AV.SearchQuery} Returns the query, so you can chain this call.
157      */
158     highlights: function(highlights) {
159       var objects;
160       if (highlights && _.isString(highlights)) {
161         objects = arguments;
162       } else {
163         objects = highlights;
164       }
165       this._highlights = objects;
166       return this;
167     },
168 
169     /**
170      * Sets the sort builder for this query.
171      * @see AV.SearchSortBuilder
172      * @param { AV.SearchSortBuilder} builder The sort builder.
173      * @return {AV.SearchQuery} Returns the query, so you can chain this call.
174      *
175      */
176     sortBy: function(builder) {
177       this._sortBuilder = builder;
178       return this;
179     },
180 
181     /**
182      * Returns the number of objects that match this query.
183      * @return {Number}
184      */
185     hits: function() {
186        if (!this._hits) {
187         this._hits = 0;
188       }
189       return this._hits;
190     },
191 
192     _processResult: function(json){
193        delete json['className'];
194        delete json['_app_url'];
195        delete json['_deeplink'];
196        return json;
197     },
198 
199     /**
200      * Retrieves a list of AVObjects that satisfy this query.
201      * Either options.success or options.error is called when the find
202      * completes.
203      *
204      * @see AV.Query#find
205      * @param {Object} options A Backbone-style options object.
206      * @return {AV.Promise} A promise that is resolved with the results when
207      * the query completes.
208      */
209     find: function(options) {
210       var self = this;
211 
212       var request = this._createRequest();
213 
214       return request.then(function(response) {
215         //update sid for next querying.
216         if(response.sid) {
217           self._oldSid = self._sid;
218           self._sid = response.sid;
219         }
220         self._hits = response.hits || 0;
221 
222         return _.map(response.results, function(json) {
223           if(json.className) {
224             response.className = json.className;
225           }
226           var obj = self._newObject(response);
227           obj.appURL = json['_app_url'];
228           obj._finishFetch(self._processResult(json), true);
229           return obj;
230         });
231       })._thenRunCallbacks(options);
232     },
233 
234     toJSON: function(){
235       var params = AV.SearchQuery.__super__.toJSON.call(this);
236       delete params.where;
237       if(this.className) {
238         params.clazz = this.className;
239       }
240       if(this._sid) {
241         params.sid = this._sid;
242       }
243       if(!this._queryString) {
244         throw 'Please set query string.';
245       } else {
246         params.q = this._queryString;
247       }
248       if(this._highlights) {
249         params.highlights = this._highlights.join(',');
250       }
251       if(this._sortBuilder && params.order) {
252         throw 'sort and order can not be set at same time.';
253       }
254       if(this._sortBuilder) {
255         params.sort = this._sortBuilder.build();
256       }
257 
258       return params;
259     }
260   });
261 };
262
